title: Super condensed thin font in the Molson Canadian Beer Fridge
content:
looking for the name of the font used for "CANADIANS"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BeerFridge-2_3939.jpg)

[http://mariskarichters.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/BeerFridge-2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161953/http:/mariskarichters.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/BeerFridge-2.jpg "http://mariskarichters.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/BeerFridge-2.jpg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BeerFridge-2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161953/http:/typophile.com/files/BeerFridge-2.jpg) | 291.27 KB |
author: Vrylyk

comments.content:
It appears to be the free font Matchbook:  
 [http://www.ffonts.net/Matchbook.font?text=CANADIANS](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161953/http:/www.ffonts.net/Matchbook.font?text=CANADIANS "http://www.ffonts.net/Matchbook.font?text=CANADIANS")  
 [http://www.onebyfourstudio.com/projects/fonts/2009/matchbook-typefaces/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161953/http:/www.onebyfourstudio.com/projects/fonts/2009/matchbook-typefaces/ "http://www.onebyfourstudio.com/projects/fonts/2009/matchbook-typefaces/")
